title: Adelie-Penguins are capable of every known sex-offense humans can commit
body:
https://www.ranker.com/list/terrifying-penguin-sex-mating-facts/cynthia-griffith

This sub-species of penguins can commit necrophilia, ped.ophilia, they can cheat on their lovers and they can engage in prostitution for pebbles to build their nests. And in the rare event that an Adelie-Penguin has a miscarriage, they kidnap other chicks which almost always results in the death of said chick due to the sheer harshness of the kidnapping itself. 

Oh yea, they can also commit gangrape as a means of establishing dominance.

Happy feet ain't so cute now, is it?
